<div class="ContentItem-meta jop-noMdConv"><div class="AuthorInfo AnswerItem-authorInfo AnswerItem-authorInfo--related jop-noMdConv" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><div class="AuthorInfo jop-noMdConv"><span class="UserLink AuthorInfo-avatarWrapper jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-1gomreu jop-noMdConv"><a href="https://www.zhihu.com/people/Paradox_Nano" target="_blank" class="UserLink-link jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-element_name="User"><img class="Avatar AuthorInfo-avatar css-1oqflzh jop-noMdConv" src="/_resources/50b5be8cd610468ca2ad089edcaf64da.jpg" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8fbbb738b4b2d20d2fcea2c753599df5_l.jpg?source=1940ef5c 2x" alt="悖论Nano" /></a></div></span><div class="AuthorInfo-content jop-noMdConv"><div class="AuthorInfo-head jop-noMdConv"><span class="UserLink AuthorInfo-name jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-1gomreu jop-noMdConv"><a href="https://www.zhihu.com/people/Paradox_Nano" target="_blank" class="UserLink-link jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-element_name="User">悖论Nano</a></div><span rel="noopener noreferrer" class="css-2dtzk2 jop-noMdConv">​<img src="/_resources/3f96e20f8a5e4203aefbeb870fee6fa8.png" class="css-1m3x3v9 jop-noMdConv" /></span></span></div><div class="AuthorInfo-detail jop-noMdConv"><div class="AuthorInfo-badge jop-noMdConv"><div class="ztext AuthorInfo-badgeText css-14ur8a8 jop-noMdConv">文理双修，凝聚共识，解决问题。</div></div></div></div></div><div class="css-124ezq8 jop-noMdConv"></div></div><div class="LabelContainer-wrapper jop-noMdConv"></div><div class="css-1k5dpte jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"><span class="Voters jop-noMdConv"></span></span>
</div></div><div class="RichContent RichContent--unescapable jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="RichContent-inner jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-376mun jop-noMdConv"><span class="RichText ztext CopyrightRichText-richText css-1g0fqss jop-noMdConv" options="[object Object]" itemprop="text"><p data-pid="pXet3m0R" class="jop-noMdConv">
双链笔记软件(我自己用的Obsidian)+git版本管理+简悦</p><figure data-size="normal" class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><img src="/_resources/b609a031bdb64e3081654d85fe735073.webp" data-size="normal" data-rawwidth="2553" data-rawheight="1203" data-original-token="v2-852f9dadda853585445356471d62f608" data-default-watermark-src="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-cef5e3e6d0b070c170d99d685f0eff36_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" class="origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy jop-noMdConv" width="2553" data-original="https://pica.zhimg.com/v2-ca213fe99bc2bb96526c293fa33325d1_r.jpg?source=1940ef5c" data-actualsrc="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-ca213fe99bc2bb96526c293fa33325d1_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" height="1203" data-lazy-status="ok" /></div></figure><p data-pid="tBfffrVG" class="jop-noMdConv">
双链笔记软件是目前最好的知识管理方式，为各种跨学科跨专业知识整理提供可交互平台，符合越来越广泛的学科交叉发展趋势。</p><p data-pid="vIr5IXwo" class="jop-noMdConv">AI目前可以整合大量信息，但是AI处理的信息与信息之间的逻辑相关性还没有达到令人满意的程度。所以为了避免被AI代替，那么就要去做AI不擅长的事。个体配合双链笔记就能将信息与信息建立相对更有价值的联系。</p><p data-pid="fpRGfxzG" class="jop-noMdConv">更何况，双联笔记是可以对接ChatGPT的，未来在个人提供的双联笔记个性知识库基础上应用AI处理、衍生更丰富的知识，是一个值得期待的前景。</p><p data-pid="-WRXMwQe" class="jop-noMdConv">双链笔记不一定是知识管理的最终形态，但最终形态一定是在双链笔记的基础上衍生的。</p><p data-pid="zGeI16lV" class="jop-noMdConv">所以各位，不要还停留在Evernote这类以存储为主要功能的知识管理软件上，该进入下一个时代了。</p></span></div></div></span><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="ContentItem-time jop-noMdConv"><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zhihu.com/question/28121700/answer/3109528905" class="jop-noMdConv"><span data-tooltip="发布于 2023-07-08 17:58" aria-label="发布于 2023-07-08 17:58" class="jop-noMdConv">发布于 2023-07-08 17:58</span></a>・IP 属地四川</div><div class="Reward jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="Reward-tagline jop-noMdConv">真诚赞赏，手留余香</div></div><div class="Reward-countZero jop-noMdConv">还没有人赞赏，快来当第一个赞赏的人吧！</div></div></div><span class="jop-noMdConv"></span><div class="ContentItem-actions jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"></span><div class="Popover ShareMenu ContentItem-action jop-noMdConv"><div class="ShareMenu-toggler jop-noMdConv" id="Popover19-toggle" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-owns="Popover19-content"></div></div><div class="Popover ContentItem-action jop-noMdConv"></div></div></div><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv">
<div class="jop-noMdConv"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="Card MoreAnswers jop-noMdConv"><div class="List jop-noMdConv" data-zop-feedlist="true"><div class="List-header jop-noMdConv"><h4 class="List-headerText jop-noMdConv">更多回答</h4><div class="List-headerOptions jop-noMdConv"></div></div><div class="List-item jop-noMdConv" tabindex="0"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="ContentItem AnswerItem jop-noMdConv" data-zop="{"authorName":"韦易笑","itemId":3107047292,"title":"evernote 替代品有哪些？","type":"answer"}" name="3107047292" itemprop="answer" itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer" data-za-detail-view-path-module="AnswerItem" data-za-extra-module="{"card":{"has_image":false,"has_video":false,"content":{"type":"Answer","token":"3107047292","upvote_num":352,"comment_num":102,"publish_timestamp":null,"parent_token":"28121700","author_member_hash_id":"225cbdbbfac26810c6b71ce96f55de2f"}}}">

/></span></span></div><div class="AuthorInfo-detail jop-noMdConv"><div class="AuthorInfo-badge jop-noMdConv"><div class="ztext AuthorInfo-badgeText css-14ur8a8 jop-noMdConv">游戏开发等 4 个话题下的优秀答主</div></div></div></div></div><div class="css-124ezq8 jop-noMdConv"></div></div><div class="LabelContainer-wrapper jop-noMdConv"></div><div class="css-1k5dpte jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"><span class="Voters jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"><span class="UserLink jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-1gomreu jop-noMdConv"><a class="UserLink-link jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-element_name="User" target="_blank" href="https://www.zhihu.com/people/qinlili233">琴梨梨OvO</a></div></span></span>等</span></span></div></div><div class="RichContent RichContent--unescapable jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="RichContent-inner RichContent-inner--collapsed jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-376mun jop-noMdConv"><span class="RichText ztext CopyrightRichText-richText css-1g0fqss jop-noMdConv" options="[object Object]" itemprop="text"><p data-pid="Hzw6S4oj" class="jop-noMdConv">今天看到个悲伤的消息，Evernote 裁员了：</p><figure data-size="normal" class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><img src="/_resources/ecffd86766934a9f93475cd3568f1f7a.webp" data-size="normal" data-rawwidth="766" data-rawheight="380" data-original-token="v2-84f4f6f97d0191c7682a4b4aa715035f" data-default-watermark-src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/50/v2-bb9fe5ecc36d9b303ff43ba0c69e26a3_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" class="origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy jop-noMdConv" width="766" data-original="https://picx.zhimg.com/v2-413c96dad604a63e71fafadd7883f61f_r.jpg?source=1940ef5c" data-actualsrc="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-413c96dad604a63e71fafadd7883f61f_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" height="380" data-lazy-status="ok" /></div></figure><p data-pid="F2GaP60Y" class="jop-noMdConv">我是差不多 10 年的 Evernote 会员用户了，幸亏去年成功切换成开源免费的：Joplin：</p><figure data-size="normal" class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><img src="/_resources/3def12d94ed84b3f8abfd9f6233e2ff1.webp" data-size="normal" data-rawwidth="2388" data-rawheight="1456" data-original-token="v2-bad76eb44954c98f3c0a7cf193acd3d8" data-default-watermark-src="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-c37a0bd267c2c5fd5b769f1bb836e632_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" class="origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy jop-noMdConv" width="2388" data-original="https://picx.zhimg.com/v2-291da3081ae74904da4bd23cd502e748_r.jpg?source=1940ef5c" data-actualsrc="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-291da3081ae74904da4bd23cd502e748_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" height="1456" data-lazy-status="ok" /></div></figure><p data-pid="UVKZWXJ0" class="jop-noMdConv">它支持 markdown，三端同步，插件扩展，最重要的是 Joplin 支持多种后端用来同步笔记：Nextcloud, icloud, <span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=onedrive&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A3107047292%7D" target="_blank">onedrive<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-25 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>
, dropbox, S3 甚至任何支持 webdav 接口的服务，都可以用来做后端：</p><figure data-size="normal" class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><img src="/_resources/f86a078af84b44e981c25820d778d19d.webp" data-size="normal" data-rawwidth="517" data-rawheight="359" data-original-token="v2-c1feb2cc4c2b878a49c98163f2a20403" data-default-watermark-src="https://pica.zhimg.com/50/v2-4f5586cfb629c32c236a545ca9be881e_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" class="origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy jop-noMdConv" width="517" data-original="https://picx.zhimg.com/v2-403726ca31a00c8d2da9740b5e95991a_r.jpg?source=1940ef5c" data-actualsrc="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-403726ca31a00c8d2da9740b5e95991a_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" height="359" data-lazy-status="ok" /></div></figure><p data-pid="9qxlCFJR" class="jop-noMdConv">
永远不会被绑定在单一的后端服务提供商上，更不会限制只能用私有加密格式导出笔记。</p><p data-pid="OXvaO3R4" class="jop-noMdConv">用了一年多后，根本没有再用回 Evernote 的想法，给大家推荐一个我现在用的免费的云，日本老牌的云盘提供商 infini-cloud （前 <span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=teracloud&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A3107047292%7D" target="_blank">teracloud<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-26 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>），它支持 webdav 服务，且国内可以直接访问：</p><p data-pid="DBg0MGa6" class="jop-noMdConv"><a href="https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//infini-cloud.net/en/" class="external jop-noMdConv" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer" data-za-detail-view-id="1043"><span class="invisible jop-noMdConv">https://</span><span class="visible jop-noMdConv">infini-cloud.net/en/</span><span class="invisible jop-noMdConv"></span></a></p><p data-pid="AlQ5jgjS" class="jop-noMdConv">它的服务器离中国近，访问速度快，且直接访问无需使用各种 XX 软件（其他云虽好，但很多被限制），Joplin 有个好处不管后端用啥，本地都会有一份完整数据，所以你可以随时运行时切换后端成其他公有<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%A7%81%E6%9C%89%E4%BA%91&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A3107047292%7D" target="_blank">私有云<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-27 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>，改下同步源即可。</p><p data-pid="wLy0MOBX" class="jop-noMdConv">
使用免费开源的 Joplin 好处是自己的数据，自己掌握，由于其开源透明，本地笔记可以随时导出成公开格式，同时支持多种后端和标准 webdav 协议的话，这个挂了可以用另一个，随时无缝切换，我一开始就是用 onedrive 做同步，记了一段时间切换到 infini-cloud，完美<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E5%B9%B3%E6%BB%91%E8%BF%81%E7%A7%BB&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A3107047292%7D" target="_blank">平滑迁移<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-28 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>，一直稳定用到现在。</p><p data-pid="zNFqG-Pv" class="jop-noMdConv">现在注册 <a href="https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//infini-cloud.net/en/" class="wrap external jop-noMdConv" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer" data-za-detail-view-id="1043">Top|InfiniCLOUD</a> 可以免费拥有 15G 免费空间，同时输入我的推荐码：<code class="jop-noMdConv">9YTPM</code> 还可以再获得 5G 免费空间。</p><p data-pid="GOxscQDc" class="jop-noMdConv">--</p><p data-pid="6vyR0_Eq" class="jop-noMdConv">
Evernote 做了十多年，连个代码语法高亮都没有，而 Joplin，人家都出命令行版了：</p><figure data-size="normal" class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><img src="/_resources/38f743ea64c2496d94de50e40bd95ca8.webp" data-size="normal" data-rawwidth="1304" data-rawheight="714" data-original-token="v2-896e39dbc509ca98836864ded607ced5" data-default-watermark-src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/50/v2-c8f2f00fa2ae3f4eddc61e06cd30c010_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" class="origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy jop-noMdConv" width="1304" data-original="https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75b8fe30559edce4462f010478498ced_r.jpg?source=1940ef5c" data-actualsrc="https://pic1.zhimg.com/50/v2-75b8fe30559edce4462f010478498ced_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" height="714" data-lazy-status="ok" /></div></figure><p data-pid="9yrxxVoI" class="jop-noMdConv">官方出的，不是第三方。</p><p class="ztext-empty-paragraph jop-noMdConv"><br class="jop-noMdConv" /></p><p data-pid="x6bn876V" class="jop-noMdConv">--</p><p data-pid="SWum0SqO" class="jop-noMdConv">各位切换到 joplin 的同学们，有一处设置下更方便，View->Layout button sequence 下面，选择第二项：Editor / Viewer，这样平时 CTRL+L 就只会在查看模式和编辑模式下来回切换了，不会切换到 split view （分屏编辑）模式下：</p><figure data-size="normal" class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><img src="/_resources/46272068202d4daeb4c31d6a0fea75b8.webp" data-size="normal" data-rawwidth="777" data-rawheight="555" data-original-token="v2-3e6a28a9e5b0284e93161166675fb302" data-default-watermark-src="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-6274bc57521d2acd7b7d7dacda3c40e4_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" class="origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy jop-noMdConv" width="777" data-original="https://picx.zhimg.com/v2-57e4b541878c3d180be1d5e94161ac27_r.jpg?source=1940ef5c" data-actualsrc="https://picx.zhimg.com/50/v2-57e4b541878c3d180be1d5e94161ac27_720w.jpg?source=1940ef5c" height="555" data-lazy-status="ok" /></div></figure><p data-pid="OHyHj3tk" class="jop-noMdConv">这个设置对于不喜欢分屏编辑的人来说很方便</p><p data-pid="sLOCXnFu" class="jop-noMdConv">--</p></span></div></div></span><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="ContentItem-time jop-noMdConv"><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zhihu.com/question/28121700/answer/3107047292" class="jop-noMdConv"><span data-tooltip="发布于 2023-07-07 00:26" aria-label="发布于 2023-07-07 00:26" class="jop-noMdConv">编辑于 2023-07-08 06:22</span></a></div><div class="Reward jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="Reward-tagline jop-noMdConv">真诚赞赏，手留余香</div></div><div class="Reward-countZero jop-noMdConv">
还没有人赞赏，快来当第一个赞赏的人吧！</div></div></div><span class="jop-noMdConv"></span><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="ContentItem-actions Sticky RichContent-actions is-fixed is-bottom jop-noMdConv" style="width:694px;bottom:0;left:259.6px"><span class="jop-noMdConv"></span><div class="Popover ShareMenu ContentItem-action jop-noMdConv"><div class="ShareMenu-toggler jop-noMdConv" id="Popover33-toggle" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-owns="Popover33-content"></div></div><div class="Popover ContentItem-action jop-noMdConv"></div></div></div></div><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="List-item jop-noMdConv" tabindex="0"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="ContentItem AnswerItem jop-noMdConv" data-zop="{"authorName":"赵赛坡","itemId":109523534,"title":"evernote 替代品有哪些？","type":"answer"}" name="109523534" itemprop="answer" itemtype="http://schema.org/Answer" data-za-detail-view-path-module="AnswerItem" data-za-extra-module="{"card":{"has_image":false,"has_video":false,"content":{"type":"Answer","token":"109523534","upvote_num":206,"comment_num":26,"publish_timestamp":null,"parent_token":"28121700","author_member_hash_id":"2dc864a5f2cb08145bb6dc2c6310f7da"}}}">
<div class="ContentItem-meta jop-noMdConv"><div class="AuthorInfo AnswerItem-authorInfo AnswerItem-authorInfo--related jop-noMdConv" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><div class="AuthorInfo jop-noMdConv"><span class="UserLink AuthorInfo-avatarWrapper jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-1gomreu jop-noMdConv"><a href="https://www.zhihu.com/people/zhao-sai-po" target="_blank" class="UserLink-link jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-element_name="User"><img class="Avatar AuthorInfo-avatar css-1oqflzh jop-noMdConv" src="/_resources/4346e2be139a414fa94cc2c71293d161.jpg" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dcaeee9018a692b8dcdd2cc2c3c4221b_l.jpg?source=1940ef5c 2x" alt="赵赛坡" /></a></div></span><div class="AuthorInfo-content jop-noMdConv"><div class="AuthorInfo-head jop-noMdConv"><span class="UserLink AuthorInfo-name jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-1gomreu jop-noMdConv"><a href="https://www.zhihu.com/people/zhao-sai-po" target="_blank" class="UserLink-link jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-element_name="User">赵赛坡</a></div></span></div><div class="AuthorInfo-detail jop-noMdConv"><div class="AuthorInfo-badge jop-noMdConv"><div class="ztext AuthorInfo-badgeText css-14ur8a8 jop-noMdConv">iPad Pro Power User</div></div></div></div></div><div class="css-124ezq8 jop-noMdConv"></div>
</div><div class="LabelContainer-wrapper jop-noMdConv"></div><div class="css-1k5dpte jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"><span class="Voters jop-noMdConv"></span></span></div></div><div class="RichContent RichContent--unescapable jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="RichContent-inner RichContent-inner--collapsed jop-noMdConv"><div class="css-376mun jop-noMdConv"><span class="RichText ztext CopyrightRichText-richText css-1g0fqss jop-noMdConv" options="[object Object]" itemprop="text"><p data-pid="RpBe4rEs" class="jop-noMdConv">在寻找替代品之前，有必要先搞清楚 Evernote 是个什么产品</p><p data-pid="kbNMdYKi" class="jop-noMdConv">一</p><p data-pid="GqwSyE9F" class="jop-noMdConv">Evernote 涨价风波引发的第一个「口水」反应就是无数个所谓「替代产品」，国内外的主流替代产品无外乎以下几种：</p><ul class="jop-noMdConv">
<li data-pid="GMLlD8hR" class="jop-noMdConv">微软出品的 Onenote</li><li data-pid="KQXTSXUv" class="jop-noMdConv">Google 出品的 Google Keep</li><li data-pid="0uaQenEZ" class="jop-noMdConv">苹果 iOS/MacOX 的Note（备忘录）</li><li data-pid="ur4Vt-OJ" class="jop-noMdConv">Simplenote</li><li data-pid="qmlqt38i" class="jop-noMdConv">网易<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E6%9C%89%E9%81%93%E4%BA%91%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">有道云笔记<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-39 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span></li></ul><p data-pid="IEOaZVda" class="jop-noMdConv">
如果用一句话来总结上述几个「替代产品」的特点，我觉得那就是「绝对秒杀 Evernote 的笔记产品」，比如 Oneonote 与 Office 的整合，keep 、Simplenote 的小巧，苹果备忘录的<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%94%9F%E6%80%81%E6%95%88%E5%BA%94&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">生态效应<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-40 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>以及更懂中文用户需求的网易云笔记。</p><p data-pid="sMOTXZJA" class="jop-noMdConv">
但很遗憾，Evernote 并非笔记产品。</p><p data-pid="C-HYGR0r" class="jop-noMdConv">对一款笔记产品来说，能够快速上手书写、编辑是一项基本功能。但 Evenote 从来都对笔记不友好，复杂的编辑栏、排版时的傻逼格式、iOS （iPhone 6s）编辑内容时的卡顿......更不要说很多极客倡导的 Markdown 格式了.....上述这些问题的一个直接后果是，作为笔记功能的 Evernote 完全不合格，而如果过去你在 Evernote 上的主要习惯是记录，那么可以转移到上述任何一个工具里，你获得的体验可能更好。</p><p data-pid="bUTWDNAj" class="jop-noMdConv">二</p><p data-pid="8vfBmBVV" class="jop-noMdConv">还有人推荐了「<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%A8%8D%E5%90%8E%E8%AF%BB&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">稍后读<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-41 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>」应用—— Instapaper 与 Pocket。</p><p data-pid="V7bqQ6lb" class="jop-noMdConv">
这类「稍后读」产品的基础特点就是排版，当然 Instapaper 的阅读时长推荐和 Pocket 的「推荐」功能也很不错，但充其量只是锦上添花。推荐「稍后读」替代 Evernote 的童鞋大抵是认为很多用户会使用 Evernote 进行阅读。</p><p data-pid="VXSqIR44" class="jop-noMdConv">又一个遗憾，<strong class="jop-noMdConv">Evernote 也不是对阅读友好的产品</strong>。</p><p data-pid="ybXoC7aN" class="jop-noMdConv">
在 OS X 和 Windows 这样的桌面级平台上，Evernote 的阅读表现中规中矩，不过由于 Evernote 没有「阅读」与「编辑」两种状态的切换，但凡你不小心把鼠标滑入到阅读的笔记里，就极有可能进入编辑状态，如果你经常在 Evernote 阅读笔记，这个误操作一定少不了。</p><p data-pid="VosIgq0a" class="jop-noMdConv">而在 iOS 这样的移动平台，Evernote 也出现类似上述问题，而触摸屏也加剧了上述问题。更无法理解的是，当你想要复制笔记里的一段文字时，你必须点按屏幕，直到出现光标，进入「编辑」状态时才能勾选文字。</p><br class="jop-noMdConv" /><p data-pid="1zJHnrOQ" class="jop-noMdConv">从这个功能来看，Evernote 的阅读体验非常不友好，甚至可以说非常差，而如果你的需求是阅读，那么强烈推荐 Instapaper 或 Pocket 这类产品。</p><p data-pid="yEmrqIZn" class="jop-noMdConv">三</p><p data-pid="5R-J_ABD" class="jop-noMdConv">记录、阅读都并非 Evernote 区别与其他产品的地方，那么什么才是这个产品的杀手级功能呢？答案是：<strong class="jop-noMdConv">收集</strong>。</p><p data-pid="6sMUEblp" class="jop-noMdConv">
收集是个很大的概念，可以是网页、图片、pdf文档、Office 等等，Evernote 在这个领域有着巨大的竞争力，比如基于主流浏览器上 「<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%BD%91%E9%A1%B5%E5%89%AA%E8%B4%B4&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">网页剪贴<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-42 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>
」功能可以方便地收集网页的文本和图片；再比如 IFTTT 上海量的「If xxx then 发送到 Evernote」的功能，还有大量<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E6%96%B9%E5%BA%94%E7%94%A8&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">第三方应用<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-43 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>
，如 RSS、扫描、邮件等等都可以一键保存到 Evernote ……正是上述海量的第三方应用迅速形成了 Evernote 的外围生态圈，也是 Evernote 官方宣称的「第二大脑」要义所在：<strong class="jop-noMdConv">这里存储着你关心的海量内容。</strong></p><p data-pid="yF4gnmID" class="jop-noMdConv">
如果以「收集」来筛选市面上的所谓「Evernote 替代品」，入围者真的很少，这并非其他公司不用心，而是 Evernote 的先发优势形成了一个围绕 Evernote 的开放式的应用生态，用户也会习惯这样的操作：我使用 A 应用，也同时用 B 应用，这些应用里数据或部分数据可以发送到 Evernote。</p><p data-pid="E69EfBhU" class="jop-noMdConv">四</p><p data-pid="53FzD7G_" class="jop-noMdConv">Evernote 完成了最基本的收集，却并没有更进一步。</p><p data-pid="WuQYEYO8" class="jop-noMdConv">这里所说的更进一步是假设 Evernote 是一款<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%9F%A5%E8%AF%86%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">知识管理工具<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-44 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>为前提。<strong class="jop-noMdConv">
Evernote 缺乏从收集的信息里提取要点、形成知识进而构建知识框架的能力。</strong></p><p data-pid="zdS9FtPt" class="jop-noMdConv">举个例子，Evernote 几年前上线的「推荐功能」，会根据你收集来的笔记内容，在笔记下方推荐相关网页。这个功能的出发点很好，从用户习惯来说，用户收集某个笔记的原因是感兴趣，而主动的相关内容<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E6%8E%A8%E8%8D%90%E4%BC%9A&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">推荐会<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-45 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>减少用户搜索内容的成本。但 Evernote 做的很差劲，首先是内容源比较少，只包括《<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E5%8D%8E%E5%B0%94%E8%A1%97%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">华尔街日报<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-46 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>
》、《Fast Company》杂志、Techcrunch、CrunchBase、《Inc.》杂志等很少的内容源，中文内容始终没上线。</p><br class="jop-noMdConv" /><p data-pid="A-Fa9yav" class="jop-noMdConv">其次则是缺乏对推荐内容的反馈机制，当然我至今也不知道内容推荐的算法是基于什么做出来的，从我的观察来说，更多的是基于笔记文字内容的相关性。不过，由于缺乏必要的反馈机制，用户与算法之间的沟通是断裂的，这导致的问题就是相关推荐越来越「相关」，而用户也越来越来越不关心。反观 Pocket ，其「<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E6%8E%A8%E8%8D%90&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">推荐<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-47 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>」功能就做得比较用心。</p><p data-pid="Iv0P2Y6O" class="jop-noMdConv">
再举个例子。很多用户不满于 Evernote 只支持两层文件夹的机制，有些用户找到了用标签（tags）替代文件夹管理笔记的办法，我也是标签管理笔记的一员。但如果你用过上文提到的 Pocket 的「智能标签」功能的话，你会发现 Evernote 的标签机制非常弱智。</p><p data-pid="v3Mz3ilo" class="jop-noMdConv">Pocket 的「<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E6%99%BA%E8%83%BD%E6%A0%87%E7%AD%BE&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">智能标签<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-48 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>」是基于对用户保存内容的<span class="jop-noMdConv"><a class="RichContent-EntityWord css-pgtd2j jop-noMdConv" data-za-not-track-link="true" href="https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E5%85%B3%E9%94%AE%E8%AF%8D%E8%BF%87%E6%BB%A4&search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_source=Entity&hybrid_search_extra=%7B%22sourceType%22%3A%22answer%22%2C%22sourceId%22%3A109523534%7D" target="_blank">关键词过滤<svg width="10px" height="10px" viewbox="0 0 15 15" class="css-1dvsrp joplin-clipper-svg-49 jop-noMdConv" style="width:10px;height:10px"><path d="M10.89 9.477l3.06 3.059a1 1 0 0 1-1.414 1.414l-3.06-3.06a6 6 0 1 1 1.414-1.414zM6 10a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8z" fill="currentColor" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></a></span>
，从而自动提取出标签，这个功能在英文内容里表现的非常完美，Pocket 可以在保存网站的那一刻自动生成相关标签。而当用户保存文章越来越多的时候，标签也会越来越智能。</p><p data-pid="-b_ffMsJ" class="jop-noMdConv">Evernote 截止到现在还是需要用户在网页摘录时自动输入标签，但如果你把 Evernote 当作知识管理工具，它就需要帮助用户减少知识获取的成本，而从海量信息到知识的转化过程中，既然文件夹不是一个好的办法，那么标签就应该成为整个知识收集、整理的重要工具，从自动提取标签，甚至自动归类等等，都理应成为 Evernote 团队开发的重点，但这些统统没做到。</p><p data-pid="jvFptwDt" class="jop-noMdConv">有必要澄清一点所谓「利益相关」，<strong class="jop-noMdConv">我是 Evernote 6 年用户，3 年付费用户，我的 Evenote 里躺着 1700 多条「笔记」。</strong>只是，在<a href="https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//dailyio.me/2016-06-28%23toc_20" class="wrap external jop-noMdConv" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer" data-za-detail-view-id="1043">我的工作流</a>
里，我很少用 Evernote 记录什么，也很少用它阅读太长的文字，因为有更好更合适的工具，但 Evernote 依然是最强大的收集工具。随着「笔记」的增多，如今，我想知道某个事物的第一选择是打开 Evernote 搜索，看看自己之前有没有相关内容，而不再简单粗暴地利用 Google 搜索，这或许是 Evernote 带给我最大的效率提升，但其实，它应该做的更好。</p></span></div></div></span><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="ContentItem-time jop-noMdConv"><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zhihu.com/question/28121700/answer/109523534" class="jop-noMdConv"><span data-tooltip="发布于 2016-07-05 18:31" aria-label="发布于 2016-07-05 18:31" class="jop-noMdConv">编辑于 2016-07-05 18:32</span></a></div></div><span class="jop-noMdConv"></span><div class="ContentItem-actions RichContent-actions jop-noMdConv"><span class="jop-noMdConv"></span><div class="Popover ShareMenu ContentItem-action jop-noMdConv"><div class="ShareMenu-toggler jop-noMdConv" id="Popover31-toggle" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-owns="Popover31-content"></div></div><div class="Popover ContentItem-action jop-noMdConv"></div></div></div><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"><div class="jop-noMdConv"></div></div></div></div></div>
</div></div></div><div class="Card ViewAll jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-path-module="MessageItem" data-za-extra-module="{"card":{"content":{"item_num":70}}}"><a href="https://www.zhihu.com/question/28121700" class="QuestionMainAction ViewAll-QuestionMainAction jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-element_name="ViewAll">查看全部 70 个回答</a></div></div></div><div class="Question-sideColumn Question-sideColumn--sticky css-1qyytj7 jop-noMdConv" data-za-detail-view-path-module="RightSideBar" data-za-extra-module="{"card":{"content":{"member_hash_id":"3516ec48140e88fed21480d6e1a1b005"}}}"><a aria-label="边栏锚点" aria-keyshortcuts="Shift+S" class="css-h9cq7d jop-noMdConv"></a><div class="css-1oy4rvw jop-noMdConv" style="top:-1573.06px"><div class="Question-sideColumnAdContainer jop-noMdConv"><div class="Pc-card Card jop-noMdConv"><a class="Banner-link jop-noMdConv" href="https://dataease.io/" target="_blank"><div class="Banner-adTag jop-noMdConv">广告</div><div class="AdvertImg AdvertImg--isLoaded Banner-image jop-noMdConv"><img alt="广告" src="/_resources/fba58715887d4abd908d2c0603293ce8.webp" class="jop-noMdConv" /></div></a><div class="Pc-card-button-close jop-noMdConv" data-tooltip="不再显示" data-tooltip-position="bottom"><svg viewbox="0 0 12 12" class="Icon Icon--close Pc-card-button-close-svg joplin-clipper-svg-59 jop-noMdConv" style="width:14px;height:16px"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M3 2L2 3l3 3-3 3 1 1 3-3 3 3 1-1-3-3 3-3-1-1-3 3" class="jop-noMdConv"></path></svg></div></div></div><div class="Card AnswerAuthor jop-noMdConv" role="complementary" aria-label="关于作者"><div class="Card-header AnswerAuthor-title jop-noMdConv"><div class="Card-headerText jop-noMdConv">关于作者</div></div>
